question: What happened to Cahir after he was spared by Ciri on Thanedd Island?
answer: After being spared by Ciri, some of the Scoia'tael found him while he was bleeding out, but before they could help him, Geralt attacked and killed all the elves. Cahir was then knocked unconscious when the Tor Lara tower exploded and was taken by Isengrim to a safe location.
